page.title: 06ONE PARENT FAMILIES - ROMSEY
page.content: I live with my mum who is divorced from my real dad and has been for five or six years. The main things a one parent family worries about are money and safety for their children on the streets. Nowadays there are hardly any places for young children to play and far too much vandalism. It is quite different and harder living with just my mum but we have coped very well. My mum has a boyfriend who has done everything he can to make us happy. Most parents have jobs, either part time or full time, but there are those who have no job at all. Their spare time is used up with hobbies or outings with their children. Some people are on social security although my mum has two jobs, as a lollipop lady and playschool teacher.
